summary: An ordinance providing for the construction of a trunk sewer, to be known as the West Montlake Trunk Sewer, all in accordance with Resolution No. 12412 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds", and adopting the maps, plans and specifications for such improvement.
